thread.title: Lukoil owner says may bow out of management within three-five years: RIA

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Lukoil owner says may bow out of management within three-five years: RIA
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Shareholders in Russian oil major Lukoil could step down from managing the company within 3 to 5 years, RIA news agency Quote: d Vagit Alekperov, chief executive and major shareholder, as saying on Friday.
FILE PHOTO: The logo of Russian oil company Lukoil is seen on a board at the St. Petersburg International Economic Forum 2017 (SPIEF 2017) in St. Petersburg, Russia, June 1, 2017. REUTERS/Sergei Karpukhin/File Photo He was also Quote: d as saying that the next head of Lukoil, Russia’s largest private oil company, would probably be chosen from among the firm’s existing senior executives.
Reporting by Maria Kiselyova; Writing by Christian Lowe; Editing by Matthew Mpoke Bigg
